feed.title: Yamtrack Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.20.1
entry.content:
Features

  • Added OIDC support, see the wiki for how to set it up and how to connect existing users. (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/56cf382b4768ff54e768a5aa1b8d697b428efbbb)

Maintenance

  • build(deps-dev): bump ruff from 0.9.9 to 0.9.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/364

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.20.0...v0.20.1

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.20.2
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixes the SOCIALACCOUNT_ONLY variable not working correctly when set to True. (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/670e757efc7352e87665025e178e5f2b1744e8a0)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.20.1...v0.20.2

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.20.3
entry.content:
Features

  • Added saving sorting preferences for the home page, media list page for each media type, lists page and list detail page. #363 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/2052169d103b3d7d68f425d372938f542b937006)
  • Added REDIRECT_LOGIN_TO_SSO variable to automatically redirect users from the login page to the SSO provider. (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/4837874a96e0897dd6d11156b39eef8d171586c5)

Fixes

  • Fixed OIDC not working with HTTPS, protocol will be chosen depending on URLS and CSRF values, can be set manually with ACCOUNT_DEFAULT_HTTP_PROTOCOL #365 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/b13a2d359f05909a26c882cc896a901a4a162121)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.20.2...v0.20.3

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.20.4
entry.content:
Features

  • Switched Docker base image from Debian Bookworm to Alpine for improved security and reduced image size @guinuxbr (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/171084dac7c53bb808bf1a37d83ce7f9fa0f3030)

Fixes

  • Fixed the details page of some video games not loading #366 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/df4d5314abe73a4ceffc24edf828aed1db20cafd)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.20.3...v0.20.4

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.20.5
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed user management bug in Docker container startup #369 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/eb934b36a84da35abcd9d3c1a481644ce2e9d9c1)
  • Fixed container not starting when no celery worker is available #372 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/373/commits/b290963f116acc7d92399765c96b3558f1cc11ad)
  • Fixed wrong episode count for some animes on home page #376 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/dd5f14cca6ca6ae191e2ff909590a0945c5b22f2)

Maintenance

  • build(deps-dev): bump ruff from 0.9.10 to 0.10.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/374
  • build(deps): bump psycopg[binary] from 3.2.5 to 3.2.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/368

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.20.4...v0.20.5
